Figure 3. Connectivity and circuit motifs of the larval visual system. Left hemisphere, hexagons represent group of cells, circles represent single cell,
arrow thickness weighted by the square root of the number of synapses, arrow thickness scale shows minimum and median. Black arrows: cholinergic
connections. Red arrows: glutamatergic connections. Brown arrows: connections with other neurotransmitters. VPNs in shades of blue for Rh5-PRs
targets plus the VPLN in light brown. (A) Wiring
